translations: v．挥舞，乱舞：用力地、无控制地挥动（手臂、腿等）。
· He was flailing his arms in an attempt to get attention.
他挥舞着手臂试图引起注意。

sentences.sentence: His arms were flailing in all directions.
sentences.translation: 他的双臂使劲地胡乱挥舞着。

sentences.sentence: He was running along, his arms flailing wildly.
sentences.translation: 他向前跑，拼命摆动双臂。

sentences.sentence: He started flailing around and hitting Vincent in the chest.
sentences.translation: 他开始胡乱挥舞双拳，打到了文森特的胸口。
